Function reference

Setup functions

These functions were created to assist data providers with the setup of many packages

setup_package()
Create a new package in the manydata universe
update_package()
Updates packages of our data universe
add_author()
Add an author to the current package
add_bib()
Add .bib file

Processing functions

These functions were created to assist data providers with the processing of data when creating packages

import_data()
Imports and establishes preparation of raw data
export_data()
Adding datasets to the many packages universe
standardise_dates()
Standardises a wide range of date inputs
standardise_titles()
Standardise titles
code_acronym()
Code Acronym for Titles
code_activity()
Code Abbreviations for Activity
code_agreements()
Code Agreement Titles
code_dates()
Creates Numerical IDs from Signature Dates
code_domain()
Code domains from agreement titles
code_entity()
Code Agreement Entity
code_known_agreements()
Code Known Agreements Abbreviation
code_lineage()
Code lineage from agreement titles
code_linkage()
Code Agreement Linkages
code_memberships()
Get conditions and processes to accede memberships
code_parties()
Code Agreement Parties
code_term()
Code Treaty Termination Type
code_term_date()
Code treaty termination date
code_type()
Code Agreement Type
condense_agreements()
Condense similar treatyIDs

Other utility functions

Other utility functions that are useful during the creation of a new package

depends()
Loading packages
retain()
Keep objects from the global environment
get_links()
Get links from manyID
get_memberships()
Get memberships' list
get_articles()
Get treaty articles by number or match
lingua()
Translate Strings

On this page

Developed by James Hollway.
